Please write us so that we can help you better. We are trying to make world a better place.\n\nBy Having this App you will never walk alone.
Welcome Welcome to custodian.You can use the two given features which will make you feel safe and your parents less worried. Watch over me Feeling Unsafe, press the watch over me so that parents can keep a track.
Emergency SOS At the time of emergency press the SOS to send your locaton so that guardians can take action. Skip
